name: European Association of Euro-Pharmaceutical Companies
membership: EAEPC is a member of the Federation of European and International Associations (FAIB)
goal: Safeguarding the free movement principle for licensed medical products within the EU, as articles 34-36; counteract attempts to restrict freedom of choice for consumers via trading patterns in breach of Articles 101 & 102 EC Treaty; assist the European Commission in achieving its Single Market objective and improve health standards through the provision of safe and innovative medicines at lower costs.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Enlargement, Public Health, Single market
euInitiatives:
Issues related to the implementation of the Directive 2011/62/EU known as the Falsified Medicines Directive

Access to medicines
